subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: With the Stanley Cup finals tied at 2-2, the critical question is whether or not the veteran Red Wings, who have one of the oldest rosters in the league, are out of gas.
snippet: With the Stanley Cup finals tied at 2-2, the critical question is whether or not the veteran Red Wings, who have one of the oldest rosters in the league, are out of gas.
